solution_line_template: The total ratio representing the number of marbles is {ratio_brittany}+{ratio_alex} +{ratio_jamy} = <<{ratio_brittany}+{ratio_alex}+{ratio_jamy}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

From the ratio, the fraction representing the number of marbles that Brittany has is {ratio_brittany}/{total_ratio_parts}, which is equal to {ratio_brittany}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_marbles} = <<{ratio_brittany}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_marbles}={brittany_marbles}>>{brittany_marbles} marbles.
If Brittany gives half of her marbles to Alex, Alex receives {half_fraction_numerator}/{half_fraction_denominator}*{brittany_marbles} = {marbles_from_brittany} marbles.

After receiving {marbles_from_brittany} marbles from Brittany, Alex has {alex_initial_marbles}+{marbles_from_brittany} = <<{alex_initial_marbles}+{marbles_from_brittany}={alex_total_marbles}>>{alex_total_marbles} marbles.
